sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from './../utils/avgRating' import '../styles/tour-details.css' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated') : (({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}
) } export default TourDetails
